website_summaries.verdict: Definitely a chafer to consider when buying in bulk for a reception or other large public occasion. We recommend keeping an eye on the water temperature.
pros: Sturdy stainless steel construction, with a secured glass lid
cons: Lid may not fit properly on bowl

customer_reviews.title: Ship clean items with all pieces !
customer_reviews.text: I just opened these to use for my upcoming event. Well I cleaned off the previous owners food from the two I purchase ! But what pisses me off even more - are the missing pieces. Shame on people who used them and returned. But seriously they can’t be checked before shipping to a new purchase . That’s why you get a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Moho

customer_reviews.title: Bent and obviously used
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed with this purchase. Firstly, it was shipped without an outer amazon box for protection. It was only in the manufacturers box. Also, the box was all beat up, and this thing has obviously been returned before (it looks like multiple times). When I opened it I noticed that it was leaning heavily to the side. Upon closer inspection I noticed that one of the legs was bent. I’m assuming that’s why this piece of crap was returned in the first place. I will be returning this and purchasing a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Much bigger than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ! Much bigger than anticipated. However the lid does not stay on hook if empty. Needs to be loaded with food and water in base for hook to support lid.
customer_reviews.author: Highlighter1000

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for occasionally catering or parties. Not pro grade at all
customer_reviews.text: Did what I needed it to but the frame was slightly bent upon arrival. I suspect this is because the box just barely fits and one good smack in the top of the box crushes the little sheet metal legs. I would return it but I didn't notice it was bent until after I used it.
customer_reviews.author: vasquidshack

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the peice! Used it for a party. Kept the food hot and looked great! Great price
customer_reviews.author: debra B

customer_reviews.title: Large dent.
customer_reviews.text: Came with large dent. This was not disclosed. Very dissapointed as I purchased this for a big catering event this week.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Serving Piece
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to serve BBQ meatballs at my granddaughter's graduation party. Very pleased with the appearance and the sturdiness of this piece. Sterno fits perfectly in the receptacle at the bottom. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally nice chafing dish, comes with 2 bowls one deeper than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Wing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chafer dish
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday party. It was perfect for our appetizer. Also used it for Christmas breakfast for our scrambled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Lora J. Cutlip

customer_reviews.title: Good but not
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why the products came all In q disposable boxes and not the original boxes as the first that I bought long time ago! With this boxes is imposible to keep it safe after we use! Plus the first time that I bought the same product was lot of cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chafer Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I Love These!!! They looked so nice for our baby shower. Definitely worth the price. I plan to buy more. Great for hot and cold foods. The pan is not super deep, but just right for items such as mashed potatoes, pasta salad, or fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Kanishie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I needed another five quart chafer with a glass lid but could only find this four quart one. It’s perfect. Can’t really tell the difference in size and it’s pretty just like my other five quart chafers.
customer_reviews.author: Bootsnoop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beautiful addition to the buffet table
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for serving our Thanksgiving Turkey. I sliced the turkey added some chicken broth and my turkey stayed warm a mind moist the entire time. It allowed me to avoid all the hustle and chaos when guests arrived. Looks much more elegant than traditional stereo pans. I’m going to order 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Andres M.

customer_reviews.title: Awaiting results.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't use it yet. Plan to use it for the holidays. If it doesn't meet my expectations. You guys will hear it from me
customer_reviews.author: Theresa thomas

customer_reviews.title: Received a used chafing dish.😡
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my package for the chafing dish as I will be hosting a dinner next weekend. I was completely disappointed when I found that the dish had already been used. I received a dish that had already been used. See attached photos. I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: elegant appearance
customer_reviews.text: This was perhaps the best purchase regarding chafing dishes that I could have made
customer_reviews.author: Greenville

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful. We use it for serving gravy in a buffet. Finally, hot gravy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my restaurant and it is fantastic for buffet lines when we do appetizers that need a large quantity of sauce or for our queso cheese for a taco nacho bar. Would also be great for a house party for a warm dip.
customer_reviews.author: heather  Coop

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I love the clean lines of the chafing fish as well as the holders for the tops. They were easy to set up, take down and clean! I used them for a large multi-celebration and all the guests as well as the honorees were quite impressed with them!
customer_reviews.author: Joi Whan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our son’s openhouse. Keep everything warm. Loved that it had the lid rest unlike some other ones offered.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Stokan

customer_reviews.title: Great For Parties
customer_reviews.text: We entertain a lot and I wanted something that was an upgrade to the usual crockpot to keep food warm. Good quality and easy to clean!

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use at tailgating this item is great
customer_reviews.author: Deidra McQurren

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very nice. I purchased 2
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very nice. I purchased 2. They washed up beautifully and make a buffet service look especially nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Jean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chafer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and at a great value. Beautiful chafing dish - and perfect size. Would strongly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Works great/looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Used for buffet at home party. Looks great/works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kuhndog

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Very easy to use, stylish, compact, holds great amount of food. I work for a hotel and host a social 3 days a week. I bought four and together they feed a crowd of 50+ easily. Some nights I only use one (like for dips and spreads). So well received. The holder for the lid is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: After one use there seem to be small spots on the chafer bowl. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, used for graduation party and worked perfectly for my meatballs. Kept them warm without cooking more or burning, like a crockpot does.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be much nicer in the pictures than is. The lids did not fit properly. I purchased two of these chafers and neither of the lids would fit on the bowl. Poor craftsmanship. I would not recommend these if you are looking for good quality chafers.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Any Party Necessity to Keep Food Warm/Hot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Cleaning was a breeze. Kept food hot.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Know that when you purchase this is a
customer_reviews.text: The product is very sturdy. Good quality for the price. Use this at family gatherings. Can be used hot or cold. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Donald Marron

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Bigger than I expected. I've order 3 of them so far. Stylish, elegant more than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and keeps food warm!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for dinner; and it looks great on the table setting
customer_reviews.author: Vahid Ghaffari

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product ... Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works well, looks really good, easy to clean. Great price! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: E I.

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! No scratches no dings no dents! Love this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant design, not too big but held plenty of food for a party of 20. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is just not there
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chafing dish for a party and though it seemed very cheap compared to what I was expecting, I went ahead and used it anyway. It did work for the first use but with the second use the water boiled over repeatly, regardless of how much water I put in it. Also, it must have some aluminum in it because the are now streaks throughout the "stainless steel" where the hot water touched the server. Not worth the money. I have several others that I have used for years with no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chafing Dishes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 chafing dishes after reading good reviews. I went to use them today and found two of the chafing racks have separated from the weld spots during shipping. I will be returning them. I plan on keeping the other one. My neighbor has had good success with them. Unfortunately mine came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blakiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas, and it is a well-made product. The only reason I did not give it five stars was because of the condition of the box upon arrival. It was barely staying together, and I was afraid that the contents were damaged. Luckily, everything was intact. I was really disappointed in the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, thinking of ordering a few more. The chafers kept our food warm throughout the evening. They were easy to clean also

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our catering business. Great for use at weddings, parties and any other gathering that you need to keep your food hot.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: box opened when received,,,
customer_reviews.text: the product is nice as it is described and seen on online but the box was opened when i received it,,,,

customer_reviews.title: Top bowl does not fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I think this produce is very pretty and I was excited to use it. Unfortunately, when I set it up for a party and filled it with melted chocolate for a party, I realized the top pan does not properly fit in the lower pan. It tips in every direction, threatening to spill the contents everywhere. I am going to have to return it. So disappointed! Otherwise, I liked the look and design.
customer_reviews.author: ToniFarmersGarden

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought the SS should be a bit thicker and more durable. It will work just fine
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The only chafing dish not to have an indent to hold it in place in the bottom container. A mess waiting to occur.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Look better on line than in person not worth the money poor quality.

customer_reviews.title: but for now it looks and feels great so I look forward to using it to entertain ...
customer_reviews.text: Another purchase I have yet to put to use. I will do so during Thansgiving and will update my review then, but for now it looks and feels great so I look forward to using it to entertain friends and family this holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's a great way to keep food warm and looks appealing than ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great way to keep food warm and looks appealing than a crockpot warmer! I have 5 of these and my guests compliments me on the way they're displayed as if I had the party professionally catered!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen and Tia Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product. No complains so far.
customer_reviews.text: After being misdelivered by post office I got my package from a near by neighbor a day later. The chafer looks nice. Lid stays up nicely as shown in my picture. Will test it out soon to serve cheese dip.
customer_reviews.author: brooka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This came in just in time for our son's graduation party. Worked like a charm! We served 30-35 friends and family with two 8 quart rectangle and one 4 quart round chafer. The food stayed warm and they were large enough that we did not have continually refill. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Aka

customer_reviews.title: Great Serving Piece!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for Christmas Eve to put my pasta in! It holds a lot of pasta! It stayed nice and didn't dry out! Everything stayed nice and moist but not mushy! Holds easily 2-3 lbs of anything! A regular sterno fits in the holder beneath! I like that it is round and not oblong, taking up less space! The stainless steel is great quality! Cleans and stores easily! The lid cover is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for home parties
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price. I've been needing some chafers and these are a great size for a small party. We didn't need the larger ones and didn't have the space for them either. These look and work great and the lid holder is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: gnomemade

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: It has been years since I purchased chafing dishes. Bought some elegant ones from Costco years ago but sold in a garage sale. It pained me to have to buy again but these worked just fine and function well. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CA Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Serving Piece
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and keeps food warm on the buffet for entertaining or family gatherings. I bought two and enjoy using them.
customer_reviews.author: Reta Muasau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and great product. It arrived as scheduled. Went straight from getting delivered and into a party (Right out of the box after delivery) performed well. Good Value.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at a family party. Looked very nice on the table, and did it's job of keeping the food warm.

customer_reviews.title: well made and affordable
customer_reviews.text: worked great, very elegant, not too bulky. I liked it better than the full size chafing dish, was just the right size

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a large side dish or casserole. I like the lid holder.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new product but what I received what appeared to be used. There is food on the glass top and burn marks on the bottom like it’s been heated before. Not happy at all

customer_reviews.title: Used for two days and really enjoy it! Just hope stay in good condition for ...

customer_reviews.text: Used for our family holiday party. This is very nice and very sturdy. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Loved Artisan 4Qt Round Buffet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Artisan 4 Qt round buffet as a gift and the receiver of it loved it.

product_meta.title: Artisan Stainless Steel Round Buffet Chafer with Glass Lid, 4-Quart Capacity
product_meta.description: Maintain proper food temperature for the best cuisine with this heavy-duty 4-quart buffet chafer. Place your heat source in the fuel holder, install and fill the lower pan with water to evenly distribute heat, and place your food in the upper pan. Made with stainless steel for superior strength and corrosion resistance, Artisan chafers are available in a variety of sizes and styles to suit any occasion, formal or informal. Great for buffets, potlucks, and other self-serve events, this chafer keeps food warm with a large pan and transparent lid with a steam release vent. This pack includes the welded rack, cover, water pan, food pan, and fuel holder measuring 13 inches in diameter and 10.25 inches tall. Hand wash with hot, soapy water and rinse thoroughly to clean. Dry immediately after washing. Avoid salt solutions or acidic foods and abrasive or harsh cleansers to preserve your piece's finish. Whether you are preparing small snacks, big meals and everything in between, great meals start with Artisan. Made from stainless steel, this chafer is perfect for serving hot foods.
feature_bullets: Maintain proper food temperature for the best cuisine with this heavy-duty 4-quart buffet chafer.
Place your heat source in the fuel holder, install and fill the lower pan with water to evenly distribute heat, and place your food in the upper pan.
Made with stainless steel for superior strength and corrosion resistance, Artisan chafers are available in a variety of sizes and styles to suit any occasion, formal or informal.
Great for buffets, potlucks, and other self-serve events, this chafer keeps food warm with a large pan and transparent lid with a steam release vent.
This pack includes the welded rack, cover, water pan, food pan, and fuel holder measuring 13 inches in diameter and 10.25 inches tall.
Hand wash with hot, soapy water and rinse thoroughly to clean. Dry immediately after washing. Avoid salt solutions or acidic foods and abrasive or harsh cleansers to preserve your piece's finish.
Whether you are preparing small snacks, big meals and everything in between, great meals start with Artisan.
Made from stainless steel, this chafer is perfect for serving hot foods.
